description: This file defines a React functional component 'TodoItem' for rendering and managing an individual todo item in a to-do list application. It handles display, editing, toggling completion, reordering, note toggling, and deletion of a todo.

methods.name: TodoItem
methods.description: React functional component that renders a todo item with features like toggle, edit, note toggle, delete, move up/down.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Saves the current draft title if valid, updates the todo, and exits editing mode.

methods.name: cancel
methods.description: Cancels editing, reverting any changes to the draft title.

methods.name: onKeyDownTitle
methods.description: Handles keydown events for the title input, specifically Enter for save and Escape for cancel.
